channel.title: CVE Feed for SOFTNEXT TECHNOLOGIES CORP. -- all

item.title: CVE-2022-40742|2024-08-03T12:28:41.529Z -- softnext%20technologies%20corp. -- mail%20sqr%20expert
item.description: Mail SQR Expert system has a Local File Inclusion vulnerability. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary PHP file with .asp file extension under specific system paths, to access and modify partial system information but does not affect service availability.

item.title: CVE-2022-40741|2024-08-03T12:28:41.362Z -- softnext%20technologies%20corp. -- mail%20sqr%20expert
item.description: Mail SQR Expertâ€™s specific function has insufficient filtering for special characters. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to perform arbitrary system command and disrupt service.
